entry.title: WIND WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: ENE 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 80 km/h gusting to 110. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
